column2: Sends forth a shockwave that applies Wither to enemies in a cone.
Apply Wither and send enemies airborne in an area around you.
Shoot a bolt of energy that applies Wither and chains to nearby enemies.
Pull in and apply Wither to all nearby enemies.
Gain Resistance when enemies around you take Wither damage.
Refill hunger when enemies around you take Wither damage.
Gain Speed when enemies around you take Wither damage.
Heal when enemies around you take Wither damage.
Stab forward, applying Wither and Blindness to enemies in a line.
Leap forward while shooting 2 Wither Skulls, then slash in a downward arc. Applies Wither.
Stab forward, applying Wither and Slowness to enemies in a line.
Slash forward twice, then uppercut while jumping backwards. Applies Wither.
Drops a trap that Poisons nearby enemies and teleports you behind them.
Drops a trap that applies Mining Fatigue to nearby enemies and teleports you behind them.
Drops a trap that Slows nearby enemies and teleports you behind them.
Drops a trap that Blinds nearby enemies and teleports you behind them.
